dcterms:creator: S. Narayan
S. B. Cohen
M. Lapata
dcterms:description: The Extreme Summarization (XSum) dataset serves as an evaluation benchmark for abstractive single-document summarization systems, comprising 226,711 news articles sourced from BBC articles spanning 2010 to 2017.
dcterms:title: XSum

dcterms:creator: K. Moritz Hermann
T. Kocisky
E. Grefenstette
L. Espeholt
W. Kay
M. Suleyman
P. Blunsom
dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail (CNN/DM) dataset is tailored for text summarization, comprising abstractive summary bullets generated by humans from news stories on CNN and Daily Mail websites.
dcterms:title: CNN/DM

dcterms:creator: O. Bojar
C. Buck
C. Federmann
B. Haddow
P. Koehn
J. Leveling
C. Monz
P. Pecina
M. Post
H. Saint-Amand
R. Soricut
L. Specia
A. Tamchyna
dcterms:description: The WMT14 EnDe dataset serves as a standard benchmark for machine translation, translating English text to German while preserving content, semantics, and style.
dcterms:title: WMT EnDe

dcterms:creator: K. Cobbe
V. Kosaraju
M. Bavarian
J. Hilton
R. Nakano
C. Hesse
J. Schulman
dcterms:description: The GSM8K dataset comprises 8.5K high-quality, linguistically diverse grade school math word problems crafted by human problem writers.
dcterms:title: GSM8K

dcterms:creator: C. Chelba
T. Mikolov
M. Schuster
Q. Ge
T. Brants
P. Koehn
T. Robinson
dcterms:description: The One Billion Word dataset (LM1B) is a widely recognized benchmark for language modeling, derived from the WMT 2011 News Crawl dataset.
dcterms:title: LM1B
